prompt: Design a dark-themed photo gallery viewer with a sleek, modern aesthetic. The main image, showcasing a starry night sky, should occupy the top 60% of the screen with sharp 8px rounded corners and a glowing blue shadow (opacity 0.2, blur 10px). Below, include a horizontal thumbnail gallery with 6 images (60x60px, 4px corners, 8px spacing) in a semi-transparent black container (hex #1C2526, opacity 0.8). Place four action buttons at the bottom in a centered row: a yellow star icon for favorites (#FFD700), a green share icon (#4CAF50), a blue download icon (#2196F3), and a white info icon (#FFFFFF), each in a rectangular container with 10px padding and a dark gray background (#2E2E2E). Use a dark scaffold background (#121212) with 16px padding. The app bar should have a dark background (#1C2526), a white back arrow, and a title 'Night Gallery' in white bold text. Ensure the design feels elegant and cohesive with ample spacing.
